Text: To achieve this dividend income in time for my retirement, the portfolio must grow with an organic dividend income of 8% YoY and cash contributions must grow 4% annually.
Cause: To achieve this dividend income in time for my retirement
Effect: the portfolio must grow with an organic dividend income of 8% YoY and cash contributions must grow 4% annually.
Sentence: <e1>To achieve this dividend income in time for my retirement</e1>, <e2>the portfolio must grow with an organic dividend income of 8% YoY and cash contributions must grow 4% annually.</e2>
